import React, { useState } from 'react' import { MDBCollapse, MDBContainer, MDBIcon, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBNavbarItem, MDBNavbarLink, } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import { useAppSelector } from '../hooks'; import { signout } from '../states'; const Header: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const { user } = useAppSelector(auth => auth); return ( Touropedia setShow(!show)} style={{ color: "#606080" }} > { user?.id ? <>
Logged in as: {user?.name}

 } ); } export { Header };
